Selling Software

Win More Customers with an Effective Sales Process

Selling software solutions today is incredibly competitive; customers demand more, research more and expect to find a solution which truly fits their needs. Sales people need a customer-centric sales approach on how to sell software and consultative techniques to demonstrate how their solution will solve the customer's problem.

Here is how we help our clients build an effective software sales process:

  1. Prospect Identification - How to find relevant engaged leads in your market.
  2. Qualification – Identifying the right leads to invest your time in.
  3. Needs Analysis/Discovery -  Finding our more – understanding the pain points (needs).
  4. Solution Demonstration - Presentation of your value proposition.
  5. Priced Proposal/Quotation – Your documented solution to their needs.
  6. Providing Proof – Relevant evidence of success.
  7. Negotiation/Objection Handling – Ironing out the wrinkles.
  8. Close the deal.

This step-by-step process forms the foundation of any sales improvement programme at Terry Forsey Consulting. 

To find out more about this service, please contact us to arrange a free no obligation consultation on 01536 771440 or submit the form to register your interest.
